mapper.insert:
insert into user_week (id, week_number, hours, task_id, user_id ,year) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.weekNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.year,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_week where task_id = #{taskId} and user_id = #{userId}
SELECT IFNULL(sum(w.hours),0)FROM user_week w JOIN user_leave l ON w.task_id = l.id WHERE l.review_status=3 and w.week_number = #{weekNumber} and w.year=#{year} and l.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.name, group_concat(t.name,' 工时:',w.hours,' ',(case tu.`status` WHEN '1' then '' else '已完成' END) separator '\n\r') as taskName, w.user_id, w.task_id, w.id, w.week_number, w.year FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_week w on u.id= w.user_id and w.week_number = #{weekNumber} and w.year=#{year} LEFT JOIN task t on t.id = w.task_id and t.review_status=3 AND t.is_delete=0 LEFT JOIN department d on u.department_id = d.id WHERE u.user_role>0 AND u.status =0 AND u.is_delete = 0 AND d.parent_id = #{departmentId} GROUP BY u.id
